item.title: If (p.rights >= 0) { on 508
item.dc:creator: @wolf_scaper wolf scaper
item.description:
@wolf_scaper wrote:

hmmmm…

try it this way…

if (cmd.startsWith(“master”) playerRights >0 ;

it may work…im not into using cheats with 503-510…

also just put in player.java or playerhandler.java

theres a code that kinda looks like this…

		for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) {
			// Setting Levels
			if (i == 3) {
				playerLevel[i] = 10;
				playerXP[i] = 1155;
				currentHealth = 10;
				maxHealth = 10;
			} else {
				playerLevel[i] = 1;
				playerXP[i] = 0;
			}
		}

this is saying that player skill 3 (hitpoints) is automatically 10 when you log in…just add the other skill id’s in and change them too 99 in player.java

if this hepled then ye…your welcome

-wolf scaper
